pageContext.title: Zothacks 2023: Intro to Web Design
pageContext.summary: Part two of Zothack's two part web development workshop where we show the process  of developing an recipe finding application from scratch. This workshop  focuses on the design aspect of web development and mostly covers design fundamentals and how to implement them in CSS
